column4: is it worth me using ubuntu on my main pc as well? or is it best to keep xp on one computer ?
that question goes out to anyone lol
I've been Windows-free for more than 6 months now - I don't need it at all, your computer needs might differ...
you can also dual-boot a computer - have both Ubuntu and XP (or any other combo) installed, and choose which to boot into when you start the machine
